title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.3 - Licensing and registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.3 - Licensing and registration

State Regulations

No vehicle shall be operated in, at or upon any terminal or
terminal highway, unless: (a) the
driver thereof is duly authorized to operate such vehicle on State highways; and unless
(b) such vehicle is
registered in accordance with the provisions of State law or unless it is
especially authorized and registered by the authority to be operated in such
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
